snippet: CBS Global Distribution, which syndicates “Judge Judy” around the world, said that Judge Judith Sheindlin, the program’s no-nonsense star, had agreed to extend her contract through 2020.
abstract: CBS Global Distribution, which syndicates “Judge Judy” around the world, said that Judge Judith Sheindlin, the program’s no-nonsense star, had agreed to extend her contract through 2020.
